title: Introduction to Python
description: Python is a widely-used, high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a programming language that enables interactive web pages and web applications.

title: Introduction to Java
description: Java is a popular programming language used for developing mobile apps, web servers, and enterprise applications.

title: Introduction to C++
description: C++ is a powerful programming language used for system/software development and game development.

title: Introduction to Swift
description: Swift is a programming language developed by Apple for building iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS apps.

title: Introduction to Ruby
description: Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language known for its simplicity and productivity.

title: Introduction to C#
description: C# is a versatile programming language developed by Microsoft for building Windows, web, and mobile applications.

title: Introduction to Go
description: Go, also known as Golang, is a statically typed, compiled programming language designed for simplicity and efficiency.

title: Introduction to PHP
description: PHP is a server-side scripting language commonly used for web development and building dynamic web pages.

title: Introduction to Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language that focuses on safety, performance, and concurrency.

title: Introduction to TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a statically typed superset of JavaScript that adds optional static types, interfaces, and other features.

title: Introduction to Kotlin
description: Kotlin is a statically typed programming language developed by JetBrains and officially supported for Android app development.

title: Introduction to Scala
description: Scala is a modern, object-functional programming language designed for expressing common programming patterns in a concise, elegant, and type-safe way.

title: Introduction to Perl
description: Perl is a high-level, general-purpose programming language known for its powerful text processing features and rapid development cycle.

title: Introduction to Haskell
description: Haskell is a purely functional programming language known for its strong static typing and advanced type system.

title: Introduction to Lua
description: Lua is a lightweight, embeddable scripting language commonly used in game development and other embedded systems.

title: Introduction to SQL
description: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system (RDBMS), or for stream processing in a relational data stream management system (RDSMS).

title: Introduction to Assembly
description: Assembly language is a low-level programming language used for programming computer hardware.

title: Introduction to C
description: C is a general-purpose, procedural programming language that was originally developed at AT&T Bell Labs by Dennis Ritchie.

title: Introduction to Dart
description: Dart is a client-optimized programming language for fast apps on any platform.
